about_the_game:
Alakamin Treasure Mountain Concept Art . jpegs. png and other non vectorized images.

This DLC contains all of the concept art we came up before we decided on what you see now.

It will be updated if we add anything else. We may even organize it a little :D

Thiis one has vector art.
detailed_description:
Alakamin Treasure Mountain Concept Art . jpegs. png and other non vectorized images.

This DLC contains all of the concept art we came up before we decided on what you see now.

It will be updated if we add anything else. We may even organize it a little :D

Thiis one has vector art.
